justification: Identifies Team B’s need to win now but mislabels Lucas Allen as a reliable starter and ignores B’s preference for consistency and veterans. Fails to note B’s TE depth (making Brown expendable) or A’s lack of need at TE (already has Tier 2 and possible Tier 1). Trade value is lopsided (Tier 1 RB for Tier 2 TE + injured WR) and rationale is thin and inaccurate, though B might accept due to RB upgrade.
